short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch your default search to Yahoo to ensure a secure search experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As part of our branded Secure Shell offering, this extension modifies your default search to Yahoo to provide a nice and secure search experience. Welcome to read more about the Secure Shell product offerings: https://www.secureshellhub.com/
